rows.label: qev090605_MSG0001
rows.name:
Your mission this time is to hunt a trigger scintimure.
Not an easy mark...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0002
rows.name:
But I'm sure you and Sensei working together will be
able to take it down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0003
rows.name: Welcome back. How did the mission go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0004
rows.name: We were ambushed by an unusual xeno.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0005
rows.name:
However, it didn't take long for us
to make her regret that decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm impressed, though not surprised.
You two are quite the hot topic these days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0007
rows.name:
Do you think this unusual xeno of yours
was working with the Ganglion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0008
rows.name:
What does it matter?
Ganglion or no, xenos are all alike.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0046
rows.name: You've seen it too, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0047
rows.name:
They're nothing but maggots plotting from
the shadows to steal all that we hold dear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0048
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0049
rows.name: Claim that xenos simply cannot be trusted.

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0009
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0010
rows.name: Insist that you have met xenoforms with pure hearts.

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0011
rows.name:
I knew you and I were kindred spirits.
It's why we make such a fine team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0012
rows.name: Woe be to any xenos that stand in our way, eh, partner?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0013
rows.name:
And I've lost students that would still
be here if not for your precious xenos![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0014
rows.name:
I normally respect your judgment,
but we will never agree on this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0015
rows.name: Er, right. In any case, good work. I have your reward ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0016
rows.name:
I hope you'll be back for more work soon.
You've been a huge help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0017
rows.name: Welcome back. How did the mission go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0018
rows.name: Well, we were ambushed by a strange xeno...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0019
rows.name: But a gift from an even stranger one somehow saved us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0050
rows.name: I can't tell whether to feel thankful or curse the lot of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0051
rows.name: Well? What's your take on all this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_JNK0030
rows.name: Respect

rows.label: qev090605_SEL0031
rows.name: Insist that you owe the Ma-non your lives.

rows.label: qev090605_JNK0040
rows.name: Rage

rows.label: qev090605_SEL0041
rows.name:
Claim that your hatred of the Ganglion
has only grown stronger.

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0022
rows.name:
Mmm...
That's the sort of debt a man cannot easily repay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0023
rows.name:
His kind are different from the xenos who attacked Earth.
Perhaps I'd lost sight of that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0024
rows.name: Yes. Hate and vengeance for the murders of my students.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0025
rows.name: I'll never forgive their kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0026
rows.name: But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0026_2
rows.name:
The Ma-non who helped us isn't one of them.
He was...good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0027
rows.name:
I suppose there really are all kinds of xenos.
How did I lose sight of this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0028
rows.name:
It seems hate was the only thing I had
to fill the void in my heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0029
rows.name: I've been a fool. And I failed as a sensei.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0030
rows.name: This isn't like you, Boz√©.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0031
rows.name:
If anyone else said that, you'd shout at them
until their eyelids peeled back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0032
rows.name: Sensei! You're back! Safe and sound![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0033
rows.name:
I've been looking for you.
I have a message from a Ma-non named Jejebba.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0034
rows.name: A message?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0035
rows.name:
He wanted to know if you were all right.
Something about a device responding?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0037
rows.name:
He seemed really worried.
It got me rattled just listening to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0038
rows.name: We barely met, and he cared that much...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0039
rows.name: I feel like I've finally found satori thanks to that Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0040
rows.name: Er, you found what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0041
rows.name:
Satori. Enlightenment.
I realize that I've been hiding behind my friends' deaths.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0042
rows.name:
I'm sorry, Reggie. All this time
I've been lecturing you when I was no better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0043
rows.name:
Er...no problem? I'm just really glad you're okay.
Jejebba will be, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0044
rows.name: Mmm... I'm glad to hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0045
rows.name:
Maybe I'll bring him a Buddha statue from
my collection as a little thank-you gift.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0054
rows.name: It sounds like you've found some real clarity, Sensei.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090605_MSG0055
rows.name:
I expect even greater things from you two going forward.
But for today, you've earned this reward.[ST:wait ]
